post:
# Features
- SolusVM Powered (Working on own panel ... but we can only provide SolusVM now)
- Owned IP addresses and ASN (AS57695 / AS57578)
- Native IPv6
- BGP Session Available
- 3 day Money Back Guarantee
- Full root access
- Customized Infrastructure (Cached Mirror, DNS)

# Offers

Only **$60** Annually / **$6** Monthly when using coupon `BLACKFRIDAY` (40% Recurring Off)

Will be available until 25, Nov 00:00 (UTC)

Payment Method: Credit Card (via Stripe), Alipay

## Mini (Khabarovsk, RU)

- CPU **1 vCPU**
- RAM **1G DDR4**
- Storage **10G SSD**
- Bandwidth **1TB (In + Out)**
- Uplink **2 x 1Gbps (Capped to 1Gbps)**
- IPv4 1 * /32
- IPv6 1 * /64
- Unmanaged

Looking Glass: http://ru-khv01.lg.zeptovm.com/

Test IP: 185.209.84.96 / 2a0b:4342:4000:21::a82e

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=39)

### Notes
- All servers are equipped with HW RAID controller and using RAID1 / RAID10 / RAID50
- Please **don't** use fake information and **disable** your proxy before placing order
- Port 25 is blocked by default, but you can request unblock via ticket
- Terms of Service can be found [here](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/1/Terms-of-Service.html)
